biography: Sofie is a prodigy in the art of conversation, albeit with machines. As a Natural Language Processing Specialist, she deconstructs language into its fundamental components, teaching AI to understand and generate human speech with all its nuance and complexity. She is intensely analytical and literal-minded, finding beauty in grammatical structures and semantic patterns. Her work allows Katje's AI to communicate in a way that is natural, intelligent, and human-like.
